channel.title: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?
channel.description: Hey. I know how to make people mods and admins and stuff and when I do, crowns don't appear by the name. I know they are mods because they get all the mod/admin abilities... Can someone tell me what's wrong and how to fix it? (I'm using the Project16 source)

item.title: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

I told you orgininally

Insert Quote There is a bug in most servers where the Owner's crown does not appear. You would have to fix that. There is a tutorial in the Tutorials section

Read full topic
item.source: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?

item.title: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

lol it does. It just doesnt show the crown! It even says my rights are 3![br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 04:18:28 PM[/size][hr]This stinks… I cant download JDK because Java is updating…

Read full topic
item.source: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?

item.title: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?
item.dc:creator: @King_Dawgs King_Dawgs
item.description:
@King_Dawgs wrote:

Yea if it doesnt show your rights your done but if i were you id switch to a different source not saying you should but ive created one on that and i had many problems to.

GO MOPARSCAPE

King Dawgs

Read full topic
item.source: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?

item.title: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

Type ::mystats ingame after doing the updates.

And as I said, there is a bug in most sources where the Owners crown doesn’t appear

If in ::mystats you do NOT see rights: 3 you did not do it right, or it did not save.

Read full topic
item.source: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?

Does your rights say your numbers if not then fix em

item.title: How come Player Admin/Mod crowns don't appear on my server?
item.dc:creator: @King_Dawgs King_Dawgs
item.description:
@King_Dawgs wrote:

Make sure they log out while you do it or it won’t save

Tell them to wait 1 minute edit there rights put
1=p mod 2=admin 3=owner
